title: How can outsourcing your information technology make sense? - Quora

response.answer_text: Within this rapidly changing and expanding environment, IT outsourcing converts fixed IT costs into variable costs and allows companies to budget effectively. Outsourcing lets businesses focus their human resources where they need them most. They no longer have to financially support employees dedicated to the IT function, nor do they have to worry about training. Key take aways from this answer is: Certification, Qualification and ExperienceRapid New Technology ImplementationRenewed Core-business FocusRisk Reduction, Compliance and SecurityOutsourcing converts fixed IT costs into variable costs and allows companies to budget effectively. The company pays for what it uses, as needed. On the other hand, organizations that try to “do” IT in-house often invest significant time in related research, development and implementation – all of which increase costs. Additionally, hiring and training an IT staff can be expensive, and temporary employees may not live up to expectations. Outsourcing lets businesses focus their human resources where they need them most. They no longer have to financially support employees dedicated to the IT function, nor do they have to worry about training. Source:How can outsourcing your information technology make sense?
